entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 80S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
